issue.title: [C++][Dataset] Ability to restrict Hive partitioning to certain fields
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7646](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7646). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I can imagine use cases where the user only want a subset of the fields discovered by the HivePartitioningFactory. 

It would look like the following at the python user level API:
```python

partitioning(field_names=[...], flavor='hive')
```
